channel.title: What's in the box? Now try to open the box...
channel.description:
This is quite a topic for speculation. So let's speculate!
[COLOR='Red'][b]Please read [B][u][i][url='https://wikibruce.com/2009/04/a-big-box-of-babel-research/']THIS[/url][/i][/u][/b] first CAREFULLY before reading ahead or posting! It's has ALL the info you're gonna need to understand this thing.[/B][/SIZE]
________________________________________________________________________
[b]The [i][u][url='https://www.whatsinthebox.nl/']'What's in the box'[/url][/u][/i] website. [COLOR='Blue'](HINT: Pump up your screen's brightness to the max and look carefully at the left side of the page) [B] [COLOR='Red']On this website, >> click on the [COLOR='Black']LEFT part of the [COLOR='Black'][u]RED RING[/u] to see a new video clip. >> click on the [COLOR='Black']RIGHT part to see a weird bunch of newspaper clippings. >> click on the [COLOR='Black']BOTTOM to open a small text field in which you can enter text to get responses and unlock things. The list of working text can be seen on [u][i][url='https://wikibruce.com/2009/04/a-big-box-of-babel-research/']this page[/url][/i][/u] which is the same as the link posted in RED above. >> click on the [COLOR='Black']TOP to open the original video's page.[/b]
________________________________________________________________
The [i][u][url='https://babel-research.eu/']'Babel Research'[/url][/u][/i] website.[COLOR='Blue'](NOTICE THE BLACK MESA AND PORTAL LOGOS IN THE PAGE'S FOOTER)[/B] ________________________________________________________________________
[b]Some direct links to the images in the [u][i][url='https://wikibruce.com/2009/04/a-big-box-of-babel-research/']above[/url][/i][/u] post >> [/b] [i][u][url='https://babel-research.eu/witb/UE/']https://babel-research.eu/witb/UE/[/url][/u][/i] [i][u][url='https://forums.unfiction.com/forums/viewtopic.php?mode=attach&id=18010']https://forums.unfiction.com/forums/viewtopic.php?mode=attach&id=18010[/url][/u][/i]
[b]A direct link to info on some of the stuff seen in the [i][u][url='https://babel-research.eu/witb/stream/']ORIGINAL VIDEO[/url][/u][/i]. >> [u][i][url='https://babel-research.eu/?about=research_cbi']Computer Brain Interface[/url][/i][/u][/b]
________________________________________________________________________
[b]From the site mentioned [i][u][url='https://wikibruce.com/2009/04/a-big-box-of-babel-research/']above[/url][/u][/i] >> [/b] [quote] Today, big things happened. The Box was opened. (ongoing updates appended)
The viral nature of this production certainly did its job. The original video on youtube had a description which was consistently updated every few days. But the description was a countdown. It now reads:
000000000000000000 000000000000000000 0000…………………..0000 0000……OPEN……0000 0000……..THE…….0000 0000……..BOX…….0000 0000…………………..0000 0000…………………..0000 [url]https://www.whatsinthebox.nl[/url] 000000000000000000
So what happened? We still don’t know… but something. All content indicates that events are taking (have taken?) place in the year 2018, August 6th. Supposedly this is when the events of the video take/took place.
Read on to find out all that’s been discovered, and dig in to the story… [/quote] . . . . IMO, i think this will soon become as big as HL itself! :fffuuu:

item.title: What's in the box? Now try to open the box...
item.dc:creator: Ihranator
item.description:
Go to the Babel Research website. Type 59462 at the text thingy at the upper right corner. When you hover your pointer over it, it says “The box=???”.

Then, this will pop up in the text box.

“As of 6th of august all remote systemchecks have come to a halt. Please contact local authorities or use remote any remote accesspoint.”

Also notice the black cat popping up at the lower right corner randomly.

Read full topic
item.source: What's in the box? Now try to open the box...

LamboMan:

I totally agree! This guy has serious potential! You never know, he may just be a George Lucas in the making.

God I hope not. One George Lucas is more than enough.

Read full topic

item.description:
Yeah… This might as well be Eon8. It has pretty much nothing to do with Half Life, the portal and the BM and Aperture logos, the resemblences pretty much stop there.

EDIT: @Imonfire: Oh lol

item.title: What's in the box? Now try to open the box...
item.dc:creator: Omega_Absolute
item.description:
LamboMan:

But, but i’ve seen an interview in which the creator states that he has the whole story ready and there will be a whole 90 minute movie made on this.

Here >> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E8rRb4z0gVA

Ya, but it’s cant be called a movie. Maybe “fan art” at best. Don’t get me wrong, I love these guys and i’m all hyped up about it too. Just don’t expect too much.

Read full topic

I hope he deosn’t sign up on a deal with FOX though. They will most likely screw up the whole concept, make it a hollywood flick . He should stay independant.

item.source: What's in the box? Now try to open the box...

item.title: What's in the box? Now try to open the box...
item.dc:creator: Omega_Absolute
item.description:
Nope. I’ve been watching this from the start and the only things that were revealed were a couple strange pictures. Check that wikibruce website for all the known puzzles.

https://wikibruce.com/2009/04/a-big-box-of-babel-research/#more-1167

Essentially it’s a video project from 2 guys from the Netherlands. The website is a “simulation” these guys threw together to see how us people would react to it. Valve, the producers of LOST, and the 2 developers of WITB all have stated that this is NOT a viral marketing campaign for any movie, tv series, or video game. The site is to be updated for it’s “next big phase” August 6th. It’s simply a video project for a college class.

Read full topic
item.source: What's in the box? Now try to open the box...

item.title: What's in the box? Now try to open the box...
item.dc:creator: LamboMan
item.description:
This is quite a topic for speculation. So let’s speculate!

[COLOR=‘Red’]Please read THIS first CAREFULLY before reading ahead or posting! It’s has ALL the info you’re gonna need to understand this thing.[/SIZE]

[b]The ‘What’s in the box’ website. [COLOR=‘Blue’](HINT: Pump up your screen’s brightness to the max and look carefully at the left side of the page)
[B]
[COLOR=‘Red’]On this website,

click on the [COLOR=‘Black’]LEFT part of the [COLOR=‘Black’]RED RING to see a new video clip.
click on the [COLOR=‘Black’]RIGHT part to see a weird bunch of newspaper clippings.
click on the [COLOR=‘Black’]BOTTOM to open a small text field in which you can enter text to get responses and unlock things. The list of working text can be seen on this page which is the same as the link posted in RED above.
click on the [COLOR=‘Black’]TOP to open the original video’s page.[/b]

The ‘Babel Research’ website.[COLOR=‘Blue’](NOTICE THE BLACK MESA AND PORTAL LOGOS IN THE PAGE’S FOOTER)[/B]

Some direct links to the images in the above post >>
https://babel-research.eu/witb/UE/
https://forums.unfiction.com/forums/viewtopic.php?mode=attach&id=18010

[b]A direct link to info on some of the stuff seen in the ORIGINAL VIDEO.

Computer Brain Interface[/b]

From the site mentioned above >>

Today, big things happened. The Box was opened. (ongoing updates appended)

The viral nature of this production certainly did its job. The original video on youtube had a description which was consistently updated every few days. But the description was a countdown. It now reads:

000000000000000000
000000000000000000
0000……………………0000
0000……OPEN……0000
0000………THE…….0000
0000………BOX…….0000
0000……………………0000
0000……………………0000
https://www.whatsinthebox.nl
000000000000000000

So what happened? We still don’t know… but something. All content indicates that events are taking (have taken?) place in the year 2018, August 6th. Supposedly this is when the events of the video take/took place.

Read on to find out all that’s been discovered, and dig in to the story…

.
.
.
.
IMO, i think this will soon become as big as HL itself! :fffuuu:
